description: The Mikoyan-Gurevich MiG-21FL is an all-weather interceptor. This is an export version developed from the MiG-21PF, but with the less powerful engine from the MiG-21F, no capability to use the AA-1 missile, and a downgraded version of the RP21 designated R1L. NATO reporting name for the aircraft is Fishbed-D.
loadnotes: Station 2 may carry a GP-9 gunpod.
